name: davis
description: Davis is a self-hosted, minimalist CalDAV web client compatible with servers like Nextcloud and DAViCal. It offers a clean calendar UI with basic editing and sync functionality across devices.
features: CalDAV Client: Web-based calendar interface for CalDAV servers. Browser access anywhere.
Minimalist Design: Clean, focused UI without distractions. Simple and effective.
Server Compatible: Works with Nextcloud, DAViCal, and others. Universal CalDAV support.
Event Editing: Create and modify calendar entries easily. Full functionality.
Cross-Device Sync: Access your calendar from any device. Seamless synchronization.
Self-Hosted: Run your own calendar web client. Privacy-focused solution.
